message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to us, I propose a price of $95 for it. This is a special offer considering its high quality and the benefits it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the product is high quality, however, I have a limited budget in mind. Would you consider a lower price of $70?

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your interest, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $85 for the product. I hope this meets within your budget and we can reach an agreement.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. To be honest, $80 is the highest I can go. If you're able to meet that, I'm ready to close the deal.
